website_summaries.verdict: This highly durable biothane training leash is available in a huge range of lengths and thicknesses, so you can easily find one that will fit your requirements.
pros: Biothane is waterproof and mud slides straight off it
The sturdy brass clip won't let you down
cons: A bit heavier than other models we considered

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy lead but heavy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 3/4" 33 ft lead to train my 6 month old boxer on recall. It is very sturdy although very heavy so she would not move. I will return to try the 1/2" and hope it is lighter. You may want to keep this in mind when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: AustinTxGal

customer_reviews.title: My dog snapped it
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes to wade, and I wanted a biothane leash that wouldn't pick up smells. All was well until she bolted after another dog one day and snapped the leash. Will not buy another as I need a leash I can trust.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this leash!
customer_reviews.text: Some women collect shoes, I tend to have a thing for leashes. I can’t even guess how many leashes I own and have seldom felt the need to write a review but I like everything about this leash. I like the way it feels. I like that it is snag-proof. I like that it’s lightweight yet heavy duty. I seriously have no complaints....only wish the 30 ft leash wasn’t quite so pricey. I’ve spent a small fortune on dog items and right now can’t justify spending another $40. Still, the 10 ft leash is one of my all time best purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Strong and light, the 10 ft and 15 ft are excellent for beginning scent training and obedience.
customer_reviews.text: I own these in four sizes and use them all the time. I have Irish Wolfhounds ranging in weight from 124 to 185. These are sturdy and don't slide through your hands when the dogs reach the end and pull. We train in obedience and scent training with the leads and they slightly shorter 10 foot and 15 foot are excellent for beginning recalls and scent work. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TDunn

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Search & Rescue Tracking/Trailing. The leash is easy to handle and doesn't slide as easily as my leather leash (less likely to get friction burns). The drawback is that it doesn't untangle from around my dog's legs as my leather leash does; however, I still prefer it over the leather leash so this specific use (running behind my dog...I don't want a leash to slide through my hands easily).
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: This leash is tough. It has pretty good flexibility simalar to leather. It's well made. It doesn't stretch like a nylon leash so it doesn't absorb shock which is exactly what I wanted for trading. I've used it for several weeks and I think it will hold up. I have the 30 foot model and while walking I leave it drag on the ground through mud, water and gravel and it still looks good. The only downside is that it is fairly heavy so it's probably not good for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working in fields
customer_reviews.text: My Plott Hound needs to run, but has a terrible recall. When we let him loose in our large yard, we attach this long line to his harness. He drags the line around while he runs so we can catch him. Previous cotton lines collect mud, grass, leaves, etc and are gross to touch and put away. This Biothane line collects nothing! I can wipe it down quickly and easily and put it away. Definitely a worthy investment!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. BrothersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We used this 30’ lead with our 35 pound dog for daily walks and as a tether so she could hang outside with us. She did not pull on it, yet after a month it started showing signs of wear in a several places, and after 3 months it broke completely about 3 inches from the metal clip. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LynnitronMom

customer_reviews.title: Best leash for outdoor activities
customer_reviews.text: We take our pups to the park daily and they like to go into the water and these leashes finally arrived today. We got to try them out and wow I love them over regular leashes for the fact I can disinfect them and they are waterproof. My old leash smelled even after I washed it after it got wet this leash totally solves the problem. I love it. It’s perfect for my boyfriends 60 lb pit bull and for my 35 lb Frenchie mix. I am thrilled w the purchase. The best thing is when they get wet the leash doesn’t absorb the water like my old one did.
customer_reviews.author: Jks

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this leash
customer_reviews.text: Bought this leash and received it two weeks ago- beware if your dog likes to "walk you" i.e. hold the leash in his mouth when your walking him. My 10 month old Golden Retriever chewed through half of it- thank god I saw that it was about to break. Save your money and buy something else- not worth losing your dog over it.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Brasch

customer_reviews.title: Best long line I have seen, really wish it came in 50ft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it appeared to be the strongest long line I could find. Sadly, I had to return it because my dog trainer insisted I get one that was 50ft instead. The return process was quick and easy. But seriously, if this came in a 50 foot version I would buy it in a heartbeat. This is definitely a sturdier long line than the 50ft replacement I had to purchase from the other company.
customer_reviews.author: knitting ninja

customer_reviews.title: Biothane is a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: We work with rescue dogs and live in a rural area. Mud is everywhere. I love biothane leads because they can be wiped clean, and last a long time. On the rare chance, one gets chewed on (not this brand) hubby just rivets the ends back together and we're good to go another 5 years. They are also a bit stronger than leather because of the fibers on the inside of the biothane, if you have a dog that has developed the habit of biting through leather leads in one bite (Yes, a dog can easily do this in one bite)
customer_reviews.author: addctd2plnts

customer_reviews.title: The best leash for muddy conditions!
customer_reviews.text: I got the 15 foot, 3/4 inch model of this leash for when I take my dog to particularly secluded hikes and to let her dip her paws in lakes and streams. I haven't had it for long so can't speak to its long-term durability, but so far I love it. It's sturdy, feels nice to touch, and best of all doesn't absorb water or mud. It's exactly what I was hoping for. I just also note that it's surprisingly heavy, so I would definitely choose one of the thinner options if I had small dog.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 30 lb dog
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to simulate off-leash for my 30 lb dog. I love that it wipes clean. I also use as a long line so she's "off leash" but I can step on it quickly if she runs off. Some reviewers mentioned an odor. When it arrived I stuck my nose into it and there was a faint smell which quickly disappeared. I would call it a normal smell for something made out of synthetic material. My dog has bitten through it, but not during use. Only when I forgot and left it on the floor. And my dog is only 1 1/2 years old so still a pup. I purchased a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy stitching near clasp pulled apart after third use.
customer_reviews.text: Stitching pulled apart after the third use. Unfortunately I “missed” the return window by a few days. Next time I’ll buy a biothane leash with rivets instead of stitching.
customer_reviews.author: shower lover

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt float still great though
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing leash! Very sturdy! The only reason i gave it a 4 and not a 5 is because it said it floats and it does not....we mainly use it for water play so this was one of my sellinh points of it. But either way still a great leash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Smells funny, but after the first wLk the smell was gone. Love this leash. Easy to clean, easy to pull back in and fold up real quick! Seems to be durable so far. My dog has taken off at a full gallop and got jerked back only because she was at the end of her leash... total accident on both Mom and Dog. But she is totally fine, and the leash did not show any concerns that it would fall apart or rip or tear. Very happy with the quality so far!
customer_reviews.author: Meggan Laucher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lead for the beach and don’t get stinky!
customer_reviews.text: I have no purchased 3 of these for our three dogs. 2 are smaller and one is a 100lb mastiff that can be reactive at times around other dogs. We bought these to take to the beach so the dogs can play with a safe amount of freedom but can still reel them in when necessary. The best aspect is the quality Bitothane and the easy to wash nature that do any absorb and odor. Highly recommended and these Viper leads, although cheaper in price appear to be well built with solid stitching that gives you confidence, even with a big stubborn dog.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Wipes clean but cumbersome to carry and attracts wet sand
customer_reviews.text: The leash is indeed high quality and feels sturdy. The orange is super hi-vis. However, we take the puppy to a lot of beaches and the wet sand accumulates on the leash. So when the puppy pulls, the leash feels really gritty and hard on the hands. The sand does fall off when it dries, and the leash wipes clean after. If we try to keep most of the length in our hands as we walk (doling out the yardage as necessary), the leash is quite a handful to carry around. So it's a quality leash, but doesn't suit our purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kresge

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: This long lead is grand. I often take my pups into the woods. This lead is a rubber material that does not stretch. Its water proof easy to clean and very well made for the price. I do find it a bit heavier in the hand then a nylon long leads, however it's a small factor in comparison. This lead doesnt get nasty when wet and muddy just wipe clean. It also doesn't get snagged and destroyed by sticker bushes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth trailing leash
customer_reviews.text: I am working my dog on trailing. This leash works very well. I need to learn to release and collect the leash in a more smooth manner that will come with time and practice. But this leash is smooth and glides easily through most of the terrain we have encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Marion D.

customer_reviews.title: FYI no black strap included to help with storage.
customer_reviews.text: It's pictured with a black velcro strap, but it did not come with one. It's seems to be strong. I just got it today and took my dog on a quick walk to see how it would feel. It's nice in the hand. It's long but thinner than I thought it would be. I have to find a strap or something to store it. I'll try to edit this and give you an update as we use it more.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.H.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this leash. I’ve used it everyday, multiple times a day for the past few months. Not one crack or break, the clasp has even recovered from being caked in sand multiple times! Will for sure buy another should this one ever tire out, I used to use long leads that were rope or cloth, never going back!
customer_reviews.author: hopedebra

customer_reviews.title: Chew Toy
customer_reviews.text: Cody, our 8 month old Cavachon puppy thinks this is a great leash for wet lawns, muddy hikes in the woods, boat rides and swimming in the lake. He also thinks it is an endless chew toy! Just know it is NOT chew proof by any means. I have to wrap it up and hide it in our puppy basket so he can't get at it. The bright orange color is a plus for dawn and dusk walks too. Little pricey in my opinion, but we're happy with our leash.
customer_reviews.author: Redhds

customer_reviews.title: Best leash ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with this leash! Two days in a row (so far) this leash has been dragged through the snow, ice, mud and rain and across the asphalt and cement too. It's awesome. A quick rinse in the sink and it's ready for the next beating. I got the 20 foot 1/2 inch and it is a bit heavy compared to nylon but nothing my 27lb beagle can't manage dragging behind her.
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: Quality feel to it.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Biothane is amazing for dog products. I love that is has the toughness of high quality nylon webbing, and the weather/mud resistance of rubber. The snap shackle is quality and the mechanism is smooth, the stitching seams good. Compared to other long lines, this one is a very reasonable price for top quality stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not true size
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thin. This lead is more like 1/4 inch by 15 ft. Very disappointed, maybe the 3/4 inch is more what I want but not true to size and very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog chewed through it.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to use this long leash during training, however my dog chewed through it quickly. Sadly, I did not use it right away and the return window has passed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L. Swedberg

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy but a nice product
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it long enough to know about the durability but I like that it’s easy to clean and doesn’t retain moisture after dragging through the grass. I gave it four stars because it’s a little too heavy for a small dog. But I got the longer line to give her a sense of freedom and she does enjoy that.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for many reasons
customer_reviews.text: The material is easy to clean, don't worry about mid and water. Doesn't rip your hands apart. Doesn't get tied up in knots. Love the bright color so I can find the darned thing in the grass. Light and doesn't drag down on the dog so you can leave it on while training.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Emelene Jefferis

customer_reviews.title: Has become my favorite leash.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this leash. My nose work instructor recomended it for class, It handles much better than nylon leashes and possibly a little better than my leather leash but cleans easily no matter how dirty it gets and always looks nice. I actually prefer it for all around use now.
customer_reviews.author: Jim1186

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for Search and Rescue with my dog. All the other leads get caught in branches and trees. This is perfect! It Slips around things and rarely gets caught, wipes clean, and doesn’t stay wet. I did cut my 33’ in half because it was just too long for me, but the half has stayed perfect! Definitely great for SAR or obedience training and recall training.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan Karber

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product except for 1 thing...
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent product. Very well made, strong, water and dirt proof, great visible color but one thing hurts it: it has a very strong chemical, petroleum smell. I am going to try to wash it by putting in dishwasher and see if that helps; will report back.
customer_reviews.author: David Hays Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality built leash
customer_reviews.text: Great leash so far. Is really comfortable in the hand and it has some five to it so on a strong pull you’re not taking the full brunt of it. Got the 20 which sounded perfect but should have gotten the 10 or 15 as no matter where we go he doesn’t stray much farther then that.
customer_reviews.author: V. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: A great quality leash, easy to clean, easy to dry. It's nice to have a longer leash to let our pup run around the city park without worrying about him too much (he still ran through a kids soccer game, but what can you do. At least the leash let us catch him :))
customer_reviews.author: Mere

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a secure long leash to use with our 70lb lab mix while on the beach. Worked great! Gave her plenty of room to romp in the water and roam. She's not a big puller, but she did run and pull now and then and we had no issues. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some people don’t have a clue
customer_reviews.text: Great long leash for off leash obedience training and tracking. After reading some of the negative reviews I realized that some people don’t have a clue. If your dog is chewing on the leash it needs obedience training, if it’s lunges at other dogs it need socializing. This is a great product for handlers to get positive results
customer_reviews.author: Natasha & Boris

customer_reviews.title: Love this long leash
customer_reviews.text: Awesome long leash. Had a fabric one and it got dirty and gross... plus our puppy started chewing through it. It’s a bit heavier but my pups don’t seem to mind. Worthy purchase. Brought it out to a friends house and she ordered on right away!
customer_reviews.author: Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Good long lead, great price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a long lead for Nosework and this works well. Lightweight and highly visible, easy to manage and it doesn't really tangle. Keep the little velcro wrap for storing the lead neatly.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: No headline
customer_reviews.text: The lead is not as heavy as I expected it to be. I bought the 3/8 inch because I wanted it to be easy to handle and it is. I can't rate durability as I have not had it long enough to know. I bought a 10 foot lead for nose work, but will go back and get another that is 20 feet if we decide to take up tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Dale E Foster

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length and I love the color! This leash is well made from a durable material that holds up to the elements without cracking, stretching or fading. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to be able to easily manage my dog while training for scentwork/nosework. Thank you for making a well-made, attractive and useful product.
customer_reviews.author: VerticallyChallenged

customer_reviews.title: No more pee on the leash!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 10 ft lead for my puppy. It's perfect. It's durable, not too heavy, and water proof! He was marking everywhere and had gotten pretty careless with it. His leash started to reek. I wanted something that he could pee on and it wouldn't stink. This is amazing. Our trainer even commented on what a great leash it was. The only downside, I thought I ordered a red one, but I ended up with an orange one. Oh well. It's still fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Heim

customer_reviews.title: Strong and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Not chew proof but it has not broken yet. The clip is a swivel so it doesn’t tangle like a non swivel leash, strong and lightweight for my small lady hands and yet strong enough for a big working dog.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Super Leash! Note - slick when wet!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Used it for a mud run with my German Shepherd! He pulled must of the way on a harness! Held up great. I will add one con: slippery when wet. Several times before I could get it looped around my thumb it slid through my hands fast! So FYI.... make sure you know how to make a loop even if you’re using the leash short! It’s a great one tho!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love it's visibility but a bit slick and burns hand a bit
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Highly visible, weatherproof, handy. Does burn in the hand and slips a bit when dog pulls. Learn to latch it between fingers and thumb in. Quick release manner and good to go. Great long line.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for hiking
customer_reviews.text: This leash doesn’t get caught on anything! We like the freedom on off-leash, but the security of having one just in case. This was the perfect solution for us. We attach to our dog for many hiking trips, and it can trail behind her with ease. No mess, no tangles, no rips... couldn’t have made a better purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tasche

customer_reviews.title: Love these for recall/tracking etc.
customer_reviews.text: Love these long lines! Odor proof, water proof, super easy to clean and store. They're very comfortable to use and maneuver. Light yet strong. High visibility. Price is right IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Rippinbass

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash. Doesn’t soak up the slush . It’s very strong and light. I hated when the leash got wet and heavy during a walk. I love it and my dog loves it
customer_reviews.author: sophia Voines

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Durable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome leash! We replaced previous leashes after about six months because of wear from road contact. This leash is exactly as it was on day one. It will last a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: K S Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Pliable, visible and non-tangling.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lead and plan to buy another. It is comfortable to handle and easy to see. The best part though, is that it doesn't snag and tangle when running through the brush.
customer_reviews.author: ruwild

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A little narrower than I anticipate, but that's probably for the better. Long term concern over the single line of stitching for the loops at each end. Works GREAT! NO tangles, stays clean, and perfect length at 20'. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great long line!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a biothane long line because it doesnt hold smells. My nylon one got wet once and was musty forever. This biothane one is so easy to clean with a quick wipe and doesn't smell! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Anne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I use long leashes a lot and they alway get so dirty, especially after it rains. I have to soak them and leave them to dry for a day. I clean this by just wipe it with towel. So far I haven't had any issue with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is strong and pulls hard when he sees an animal. This line has held up great so far. And the material is nice as it doesn't get stuck when it gets wrapped around a tree or something and it doesn't pick up dirt or debris. It's easy for me to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lead for recall and tracking
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 except the buckle broke after a few months of use. Otherwise - it's a fantastic lead for it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Staid

customer_reviews.title: Freedom of off leash, safety of on
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought the 30 foot version to use to practice recall training for our 60 pound pit mix and allow her to run and play with her dog friends while not technically being off leash. That leash served its purpose, but now that she’s proven herself a bit more, we got the 15 foot version which is perfect. Much lighter for us to carry and for her to drag around, doesn’t get as tangled if she’s playing. The bright orange color is perfect for visibility in darker conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright color and durable. Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like this leash because it’s long and does stay dirty. If it gets dirty you can wipe us off very easily. I like that this leash is bright orange. easy to see. Works well for us! We use it to work on recall
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: We'll constructed but not what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's well constructed but the material feels a bit sticky so it doesn't slip through my fingers. It's also thicker and heavier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Renton

customer_reviews.title: Dog training lease
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get tangled up, strong my German Shepard doesn't strain cord or me, use for training it is invaluable a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hill

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Leash!
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash! A local dog trainer (From Dusk Til Dog) recommended this leash. Waterproof, easy to clean, durable, long enough for my dog to venture around where he wants. It also does not hurt your hand like the typical nylon leashes. Lastly, I ordered the orange after reading a helpful review; people from a distance can see the bright colors more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brooks

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it
customer_reviews.text: So I really like this long line as it allows me to give my dog free rein at parks where shes required to be on leash while still having control. The only thing that I dont like about it is that I have to find a way to wrap up the leash when the total length isnt being used.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: training leash
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these leashes within the last few months, 2 are working out well ,one of the leashes has cracked down to what appears to be a cable or core in the center. They are great for training our dogs to come and learn to fetch. Just wish the one hadn't cracked after only being used for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F.

customer_reviews.title: Great leash for training and walking.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to hold and helps train my lab (60 lbs) on walks. Nice and lightweight and has held up to the rain and being dragged on the ground. The bright color helps my dog see the line and follow it back around poles and to get himself untangled. Great leash!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bolduc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Scentwork
customer_reviews.text: I love this lease. I have bullmastiffs and it is strong enough without being bulky. Very flexible and easy on the hands, lightweight feel too. It does have a strong odor when it first arrives, but I goes away quickly
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than a standard leash but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy leash compared to a standard leash. But biothane is great for wet conditions and doesn't pick up sharp particles from vegetation.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So far This has worked great for are 135 pound cane corso. Doesn’t show any signs of falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: lasted about 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: it's an OK lead but my dog bit right through it cutting it in 2. For the price I would have liked it last longer
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Tiernan

customer_reviews.title: Best leash I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I have the long training leash and the shorter version. We use the long 6ft for walks around the house and the short one when we leave home and he needs to stay close. They are lightweight and durable. I like that I can simply wipe them off after getting dirty.
customer_reviews.author: scorson

customer_reviews.title: Great leash
customer_reviews.text: Excellent leash. Strong and sturdy. Thought it might be too heavy, but our dog doesn't have any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck T.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice feel, and easy to clean and doesn't tangle
customer_reviews.text: Really nice feel, and easy to clean and doesn't tangle. I highly recommend the orange vs. the darker colors, so it is highly visible in the woods or for tracking.
customer_reviews.author: ajax

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t expecting for it to be as heavy duty as it is! Bit of a chemical smell but it subsided quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, especially if you leave in a rainy area :)
customer_reviews.text: I live in WA and the rainy weather kept ruining the regular leashes. They would smell regardless of how much I washed them. This leash is such a great solution. I can now walk mu dog without worrying about the leash getting wet. The length is also great for my dog who loves to sniff around bushes.
customer_reviews.author: Silva Construction LLC

customer_reviews.title: Nice long training lead.
customer_reviews.text: Nice long lead for walking and training our German Shepherd. Highly visible
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great training leash.
customer_reviews.text: Love the length for training my dog could be a little wider like 1 or 1.5 inches wide.
customer_reviews.author: CristinaLouise7

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this leash! We live in Hawaii where anything and everything can hold a stinch forever. This leash is perfect for trail running and beach runs, where afterward, I can just rinse it right off and it's good as new. It holds up really well with my malinois/horse who's been breaking leashes since he was a puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle H Layman

customer_reviews.title: Good as expensive options
customer_reviews.text: Required for dog training class for my dog on leash (doesn’t prevent dog from moving naturally)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well made, quality product feels good in the hand
customer_reviews.text: Great leash, superb quality , used to do recall training on a 90 lb German Shepherd with a mouthing habit.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great long lead
customer_reviews.text: I have recommended this to three people. It’s perfect for scent work training.
customer_reviews.author: K.lovell

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs that aren't ready or able to be off leash but need more freedom
customer_reviews.text: Love this line. The orange makes it easy to see and the rubber material dries fast when wet. Dog lives the extra freedom.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality long line. We use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Super lead for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I love the different lengths but the 50 ft is quite heavy. Great for trail & beach walking & allows more freedom with control.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthless

customer_reviews.title: Good durability
customer_reviews.text: Stands up to an active dog through lots of environments.
customer_reviews.author: Beth R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leash that stays clean
customer_reviews.text: I love how this leash doesn't pick up dirt or sand like other long lines I've used. It's really easy to grip and won't give you rope burn. The hardware is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I just love this leash
customer_reviews.text: I just love this leash. It's easy to grasp, does not tangle, and best of all it is a breeze to clean. Just dump it in my utility sink and rinse the dirt away. Take a towel and dry it off. It couldn't be easier and that is important especially when you are walking in the woods on a rainy day. Love the color too. The heavy duty clamp is easy to snap on the dog's collar. As I said in the beginning, I just love this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Conner

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment for training
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this lead. I upgraded from a cheap webbing style lead and should have got this from get go. My 9month 38kg German Shepard has plenty of pull went he wants and this lead has held up well with his training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great for scent work. Just want more colors
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Unsure of safety
customer_reviews.text: Been using this less than a month and the threads look like they are loosening. Disappointed, so I contacted the company to tell them and was issued a full refund. Glad there is a company who stands by their product.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light but I do wonder how strong it is if my 110 lb Bullmastiff hit the end of the leash. But I only use it in competition so not much chance of that happening.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, durable leash
customer_reviews.text: Our dog started taking nosework classes and this is the perfect longer leash to use for class. Very easy to clean if it gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: DMZScrab

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have the 30 ft bought the 20ft for training as well!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hand Feel
customer_reviews.text: This lead is perfect for scent work. It has a nice comfortable hand feel; just the right size for me. It's been great in class and trials.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine S

customer_reviews.title: Great training/walking leash
customer_reviews.text: This leash is easy to hold and does not catch weeds or sticks. It may be a little too heavy for a small dog, mine is big and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this long line! Sturdy, great length, and the best part is biothane is so easy to clean! Unlike fabric longlines that get nasty, this is soooooo much nicer. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey Joy Largen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomend
customer_reviews.text: Great lead. I use this multiple time a week for SAR training. Easy to see at night although needs to be wiped down more often due to light color. I highly recommend the Viper biothanelead highly.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my leather long line with this and this is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Dp4

customer_reviews.title: Amazing long leash!
customer_reviews.text: I love this material. I was worried about a leash with too much friction causing rope burns, but this is perfect. I also love the 15ft option for my dog! The 1/2inch width was also perfect for her size (30lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Multipurpose Lead
customer_reviews.text: I picked this line to use for working foals and older horses in hand as the weight and feel is similar to a rein vs a heavy cotton or nylon lead. It’s really been a wonderful tool to use. I plan on getting several different colors to use when working several together.
customer_reviews.author: BackyardHorseWitch

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came in a smaller size
customer_reviews.text: This lead works very well. I just wish it came in a little narrower width and a smaller clip for my dog. Would be perfect for a larger dog than mine.
customer_reviews.author: pam k.

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash!
customer_reviews.text: Great leash. Strong, sturdy material. Went out with my dog in below zero temps and the leash held up great. Still pliable and easy to use. Highly recommend. Will be getting the 30’ one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiti Hamrick

product_meta.title: Viper Biothane K9 Working Dog Leash Waterproof Lead for Tracking Training Schutzhund Odor-Proof Long Line with Solid Brass Snap for Puppy Medium and Large Dogs
feature_bullets: LEAD WITH PURPOSE with the Viper Biothane Dog Leash. This robust webbed dog lead is specially coated to emerge from even the swampiest environments, dry and smell-free, without loss of flexibility. !!! NOT A CHEW PROOF MATERIAL, NOT TO BE USED FOR TIE OUT !!!

EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE: Biothane dog leash boasts a flexible substrate core bonded with a waterproof coating, perfect for environs where strength and cleanliness are crucial. It will not get stiff during extreme cold and will not melt during extreme heat. Super Heavy Biothane webbing has 750 lbs of breaking strength for 3/4 “ wide lead.
MORE DURABLE than leather dog leashes, the Biothane dog leash boasts a flexible substrate core bonded with a waterproof coating, perfect for environs where strength and cleanliness are crucial.
SOLID BRASS HARDWARE is ideal for working dogs in law enforcement or military operations. Will not rust.

MADE IN THE USA from the highest quality materials, our Biothane Dog Leads come in 5 different colors, 4 width and 4 different length, ensuring that there is a suitable lead for any dog and every task.
